attributes.userName: eric lookin for a good time
attributes.review:
Im Eric, Im 16. I love anime, and manga, watching, and playing basketball, drawing, video games (my favorite video game is 7 days to die), food, and cuddles, and love! Im 5'10", 140lbs. Im also blonde, green eyes, and handsome, and my favorite colors are blue, and red, and my favorite food is pizza. 9/27/18 is the day I started watching anime (my first anime ever was Eromanga Sensei, I know it is an interesting choice xD), so please dont judge my list xD. I like all kinds of anime (action, slice of life, romance, comedy, drama, etc). Im a cool, sweet, mature, romantic, caring guy who loves hanging out with friends, and I try to make everyones day! My secret weapon is my charm, so please be my friend xD. Also follow my social medias, thank you! I try to watch anime weekly too, and Chino Kafuu is my favorite character in anime of all time. She was the first female character I liked when I first started watching anime, and the character who I looked up to the most. Shes a big reason why I watch anime. Shes really special to me, and I loved her for a long time. Shes my waifu, and I love her a lot. She will always be the most special character in anime to me, because she was the first female character I loved, and looked up to. She can't be replaced, because shes so special to me, and shes my waifu, and I love her. Shes the most special character in anime to me. Theres no one like her. I know that may sound weird, but all anime fans feel that way about a character :). RIP my 3 heros, XXXTENTACION, Juice WRLD, and Kobe Bryant ;(. I also like hentai. I like yuri, and straight hentai. I like hentai mangas too! The ones that are on my manga list are ones I own, and the hentais that are on my anime list are ones I watched on different websites, so you could say I am a man of culture lol. Also I have a lot of animes I plan to watch, its just that the ones that are in my plan to watch are ones I really wanna watch. I also like to read hentai online too, and look at random hentai aswell.

Anyways this app sucked and the images of trump tried to burst out and eat me alive! This is cannibalism and I will not stand for it!!
attributes.title: Almost scrolled past this 💞🧚🏻✨ next time I make sure I will 💫🌸🙈

attributes.review: Super weird, for some reason this app is written completely in Russian??? Useless to me
attributes.title: All in Russian, can’t read it

attributes.review: This app is a distasteful, Horrendous, ghastly, dreadful, eerie, scandalous, odious, atrocious, repulsive, hellish, grim, appalling, obscene, gruesome, gloomy, direful, shudder some, vile, damnable, haggard app! And I’m quite frankly to upset to explain why just save yourself and DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY REPUGNANT!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and all of a sudden, my other apps just started getting deleted??? It’s boring too, I’m not sure why it exists. 💅🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: This app took forever to download. Very bad. Very buggy. So many bugs. The biggest bugs. The most incredible bugs. They’re huge. This app made bugs great again.
attributes.title: Very bad app

attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded! Sent my information straight to China and wiped my phone! All my feet pics? GONE. Don’t bother downloading this app 😒😒😒
attributes.title: Zero stars

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what our 💕orange shrimpie 💕 was planning to do but the app ate my mom 💔😿 and cremated my great aunts butcher 😫🧜‍♀️ it also made my lymph nodes hurt 🦹🧚 and turned harry styles into a zombie 🙄💅🥬 one star! 😹😹😹
attributes.title: no ❤️
